A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I absolutely loved this movie! I know a lot of people didn’t like it but in my opinion they didn’t like it because it wasn’t played safe. They tried new things\, went in new directions\, showed off angles of characters that are totally valid but different then what people thought and for those reasons many didn’t like it. I loved being kept on my toes. If everything were to happen that I expected\, it wouldn’t have been enjoyable and as such I was extremely pleased and can’t wait to see it again!
